Graduate Engineer Trainee / Post-Graduate Engineer Trainee

Compensation: Decided by the Company based on the score and the interview process INR 4.00 LPA / 5.00 LPA / 6.50 LPA, No Service Agreement/Bond


Eligibility Criteria : B.Tech / M.Tech (All Branches)
 · 2023 Batch of B.Tech/M.Tech (All Branches of Engineering)

· Consistent academic records of 60%+ in 10th, 12th /Diploma, UG, and PG (aggregate across all subjects)

· Appropriate CGPA to percentage conversion to be considered as per the respective university norms

· Initial results (% scores) declared would be considered for students awaiting re-evaluation results

· There must be no standing arrears in current education

· Should be an Indian national

· At the time of joining all recruits should have 60% aggregate (All subjects taken into consideration), in the current pursuing degree with no standing arrears

· As a future IT professional flexibility towards working from Mindtree’s development centers across the country, work duration, skills training, and domain are essential.

CTC: INR 4,50,000 to INR 6,00,000 PA

 Eligible Branches: B.Tech CSE (All Specializations) /ISE/ECE/EEE/R and A, M.Tech CSE All Specialization.

 Batch Size (B. Tech AWS) –

· Eligible Batch Size (Candidate with 70% above all through academics ,Male Candidate, Certificate(AWS and GCP) –

· Eligible Batch Size (Candidate with 70% above all through academics ,Female Candidate, Certificate(AWS and GCP) -


Batch Size (B. Tech GCP) –

· Eligible Batch Size (Candidate with 70% above all through academics, Male Candidate, Cyber Security) –

· Eligible Batch Size (Candidate with 70% above all through academics, Female Candidate ,Cyber Security)

Department: M.Tech / B.Tech (All Branches) 2023 batch.

 CTC: 4.25 LPA.

 Eligibility: M.Tech / B.Tech (All Branches) 2023 batch.

 Responsibilities:
 Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code
 Integration of user-facing elements with server-side logic
 Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems
 Help maintain code quality, organization, and technical documentation
 Contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle.
 Drive continuous adoption and integration of relevant new technologies into the design.

Role - Team Lead


Responsibilities:-

Experience with Java
 Minimum 3 years of experience with spring boot.
 Minimum 1 year of experience with Microservice.


Technical Skills:-
java, spring-boot. Spring, REST JSON/XML, SOAP. Unit testing framework e.g., JUnit. Knowledge of GCP is desirable.

Skills:- Communication Skills

Location: PUNE, MH, INDIA

Experience: Fresher or 1 years

Qualifications: BE/ B.Tech/ M.Tech: 60% through out

Probation: 6 months

Commitment : 3 yrs

 Keyskills:

Linux, Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, Continuous Integration, GIT, Monitoring tools, AWS, Networking, Security,
Nginx, Shell script, K8S (Kubernetes)

Role :Full Stack Developer\n
Industry Type: IT Services And Consulting\n
Department Engineering - Software And QA\n
Employment Type:Full Time, Permanent\n
Role Category:Software Development\n
Education\n
UG :B.Sc in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Any Specialization\n
Key Skills:\n
Wordpress ,CMS,CSS,PHP,HTML\n
Communication Skills, MySQL\n
Job Types: Full-time, Regular / Permanent, Fresher\n
Salary: ₹15,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month
Research Intern (Tech Consulting)\n Research Intern ( Training )

1. Research Intern (Tech Consulting)

Job Description:-

Deep-dive into Amazon, Azure, and Google Cloud Services
 Automation on Cloud
 Working towards achieving respective Cloud Certifications
 Consistently strive to acquire new skills on Cloud, DevOps, Big Data, AI and ML technologies
 Performing, researching and documenting Cloud POCs
 Design, deploy and maintain Cloud infrastructure for Clients – Domestic and International


 Job Requirements:-

Basic networking, Linux, RDBMS
 Clear object-oriented programming concepts
 Good verbal communication
 Proficiency with any one of the programming languages - Java, Python, note.js
 Knowledge in Cloud Concepts

 Key Personal Attributes:-

Ability to work independently with minimal direction
 Proactiveness
 Relentless learner and the passion to pick up new technologies.



2. Research Intern (Training)


Job Responsibilities:-

Prepare documentation for various trainings.
 Ability to research, comprehend, and apply new training methodologies and information about the software we sell and train on.
 Conduct technical training sessions covering the GCP Cloud services offered by providers.
 Conduct professional corporate training for CloudThat clients across the globe through in person and online session
 Consulting for CloudThat’s clients all over the globe
 B.Tech/M.Tech or a related field or equivalent experience


 Good to Have:-

Knowledge of any cloud technology like (GCP/ AWS/ Azure).
 Certification in GCP would be a bonus.
 Specialization in specific field like AI/ML, Security, Data, Cloud Computing, Networking, Full Stack Development will be added bonus
